Veterinary and human vaccines maker, Indian Immunologicals Limited (IIL), has launched the Classical Swine Fever (CSF) vaccine under the brand name Raksha Class.

articles.title: COVID-19 Social Distancing: Study suggests 6 feet is not enough, virus can travel up to 20 feet - Firstpost
articles.description: The current guidelines for social distancing may not be able to restrict the transmission of SARS-CoV-2 virus under different weather conditions.
